snippet: Donald J. Trump’s children have assumed an outsize role at the Republican Convention, drawing a following of their own....
abstract: Donald J Trump's five children, Ivanka, Donald Jr, Eric, Tiffany and Barron, are emerging as celebrities in their own right at Republican National Convention; are redefining traditional role of candidate's family, with eldest children carrying out different but complementary missions to get their father elected.

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and MICHAEL BARBARO
byline.contributor: Nicholas Fandos, Trip Gabriel and Jeremy W. Peters contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump’s children have assumed an outsize role at the Republican Convention, drawing a following of their own.

headline.main: Mobbed by Fans, New Celebrities Emerge: Trump’s Kids
headline.print_headline: New Celebrities Emerge in Cleveland: Trump’s Children
